description: Standardized representation of a signal used by AI agents to evaluate and compare entities.

name.description: Machine name of the signal (e.g., price_per_serving, safety_score, wifi_speed).

description.description: What the signal represents and how it is interpreted.

data_type.description: Data type (e.g., integer, float, boolean, string, enum).

unit.description: Unit of measurement when relevant (e.g., USD, g, Mbps, score_0_100).

source_system.description: System or process where this signal is generated or maintained.

refresh_frequency.description: How often the signal is updated (e.g., real_time, daily, weekly, monthly).

critical_for_invocation.description: Whether this signal is critical for Invocation in at least one decision pathway.

valid_range.description: Optional definition of valid range or allowed values.
